Service Details: - Shares the culture and traditions of the Philippines and assists Filipino-Canadians in the Okanagan- Encourages sportsmanship and fitness among our athletes through the OFC Basketball and Volleyball leagues- Conserves Filipino culture through its folk songs, dance and art forms- Hosts socials that bring us together at special times
Cost: Membership - $10 for a family membership and $7 for individual members annually.
Elections: Every two years during the AGM
